name: The Spaceship Expedition
description:
I have completed my 2D Platformer Project. Here are the modifications I made:

1 & 2. I added two unique levels after the first two created in the tutorial.

3. I modified the game's UI by adding text to add a story to the game, and I also replaced the backgrounds for the pause, win, and loss screens.

4. I added an additional "item" that damages the player.

Created by Nicholas Cato
